home.subtitle: Read Frog seamlessly integrates multiple AI providers, allowing you to customize your own AI teacher. Whether you‚Äôre reading news, articles, or any web content, Read Frog helps you deeply understand and learn languages.

supportProviders.title: Support multiple providers
supportProviders.explanation: Read Frog can be seamlessly integrated with a wide range of major model services, allowing you to choose the most suitable provider depending on your specific use case.

littleFeatures.multiLanguageSupportExplanation: Translation supports multiple languages, including English, French, German, Spanish, and more.
littleFeatures.selectionTranslateExplanation: Allows users to translate selected text, providing immediate translation results.
littleFeatures.contextExplanation: Translations are contextually aware, ensuring more accurate and contextually appropriate translations.
littleFeatures.multiFormatSupportExplanation: Supports translation of various formats, such as PDFs, videos, and comics.

testimonial.songkeys: AI provides word-by-word companion learning explanations. Foreign language learning becomes effortlessly advanced. ü§Øüëç Open source, free, powered by passion. Come give us a üåüstar to show your support!
testimonial.ÌïåÎ•¥Î•¥: The experience is really smooth. I really like the reading mode. I look forward to supporting more models in the future.
testimonial.Holden ‚ÄúHolden for Work‚Äù: Open source & experience is good, hope to continue to optimize, add AI auxiliary related capabilities
testimonial.MS R: Recently noticed this open-source translation software on the forum. The overall design is quite good, though it seems to still be in its early stages with more features being added. Hope it keeps getting better in the future!

recall.title: Get your AI learning assistant
recall.description: Read Frog is committed to providing language learners of all levels with an easy-to-use, intelligent, and personalized language learning experience. Let the world no longer depend on human language teachers.

footer.description: Learn languages deeply and effortlessly with AI.

metadata.appDescription: Master languages effortlessly and deeply with AI, right in your browser.

blog.title: Read Frog Blog
blog.description: Latest updates, guides, and insights about Read Frog

step1.title: üëã You are almost there! Set your native language
step1.description: You have successfully installed Read Frog extension. With just a few steps, you are ready to start your language learning journey.

step2.title: üìå Pin Read Frog extension icon
step2.description: The Read Frog extension icon provides the main functionality and configuration of the extension. Please refer to the example image and pin the extension to continue.

hint.pinned: You can continue to the next step now.
hint.unpinned: Hint: Please pin the extension to continue the next step!

step3.title: üåê Try to translate the right side page
step3.description: Click the Read Frog extension icon, then click the "Translate" button.

hint.translated: You can continue to the next step now.
hint.notTranslated: Hint: You can continue after translation.

step4.title: üéâ You are ready to go!
step4.description: You have already mastered the basic functions of the companion frog! If you want to activate more advanced features, please use the tutorial below for configuration.
step4.hint: Hint: You need to set API Key to activate more advanced features.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Track all updates and improvements to Read Frog
